phrases: You are probably surprised to see her covered in blood.
No, do not look at me!
Sis, get me a bath towel!
There is nothing embarrassing about a nosebleed.
Oh, look at these big peaches!
Um, did something happen to Hina?
Wait, come to think of it...
The type that does as he is told
But maybe ice cream would have been better.
No, I am going to stay here!
Well, we are going to the supermarket for the sale.
Keep lying down for another 20 minutes.
Apparently her homeroom teacher talked to her after school.
Ms. Kawamoto, why are not you getting along with everyone?
It is always been like this.
I told you then, about Sakura!
Do not raise your voice to me.
Honestly, Ms. Kawamoto, why cannot you be more cooperative?
It was not just because of the sunset.
So until just a little while ago, she was furious and crying hysterically.
My mind went blank too when I heard.
Maybe I will get called in for a talk soon, too.
I am the only one at our house who can go.
I wonder if the other girl's parents will come, too.
Can I hold my own against them?
What will I do if they turn out to be those monster parents you hear about?
How dare your kid accuse our cute daughter like that?
What have you done to my granddaughter, damn it?!
And if that does not work...
Shall we come to an amicable resolution?
The Shadowy Monster of Ginza *** Street
My alma mater will be engulfed in a sea of flames!
Hina did not do anything wrong.
Besides, there are so many people I can rely on.
I am sure it will work out.
These people are in the middle of something!
I will be counting on you.
At last, we made it this far.
One more win for both of us and we will make it to the finals!
But a powerful enemy is lying in wait for me.
No, the Newcomer King among Newcomer Kings!
Because of that regulation for participants being 5th dan or lower and under 26 years old,
that Junkei Yamazaki has been the Newcomer King for the last four years!
If this keeps up, he will be the eternal Newcomer King!
I do not know if that title would be an honor or dishonor.
It is a dishonor, of course.
You better not lose either, to the Irritated Prince of the East!
He is been doing well lately, which has made him even more irritated.
Personality: The more he wins, the more irritated he becomes (three-stage reverse sliding scale)
Attack: Fast Play/Tongue-Clicking Favorite Pieces: Bishop, Rook
I do not like that tongue clicking.
I heard he is gunning for us.
Because you and I are the princes of the next generation, of course.
He is worried that we will steal his princely position!
It even said so in Modern Shogi!
This is a variation on the Cheerful Rook from the study group, but...
Silver to 3-2, Silver to 3-7, Pawn to 4-4,
and for Pawn 3-5, Pawn same, and Silver to 4-6?
Also, a variation to the Bishop Exchange with the same pattern,
how is Promoted Bishop to 2-8, Promoted Bishop to 4-4,
But would Pawn to 2-2, Gold same, Silver to 3-3 be difficult?
What do you think about Rook to 6-9?
That aside, you are going to Osaka tomorrow a day early, right?
It is more important for you right now to stay healthy.
mixed in with the smell of the river,
What is Hina doing right now?
Is she able to sleep all right?
I will be counting on you.
Even when I do my best, I go nowhere.
I cannot do what normal people can do.
And yet, I do not know how I can be helpful.
But, I have no way of being helpful, other than this.
Even if it is just with one thing, I want to be strong for them.
If something happens, Ill be counting on you.
At that time, when Akari's cheeks and voice were lit up by the setting sun...
I cannot get them out of my head.
For the first time, I feel desire for something.
And it is not an innocent desire.
Whether that is a good thing or a bad thing...
I want to win, no matter what.
If I win this match, I will go on to the finals.
Out of all the professional shogi players in their 20s, he is the most promising.
He is trained at his workshop to become good at playing fast and aggressively.
His nickname is the Irritated Prince of the East.
In this world, strength is everything.
If you are strong, everything will become justified.
Let us have a good game.
So he intends to come at me hard and fast.
Makes me wonder if it is on purpose.
TAP TAP TAP TAP TAP TAPTAPTAP
TAP TAPTAP TAP TAP TAP TAPTAP
I cannot let it get to me though.
It will make it harder to focus.
His defense is strong on the side.
So that means I just have to go from above.
If that is what he will do, then I will go Knight to 8-6.
Does he have to do all this to play shogi?
How can he think it is okay to behave like this?
How can he sit there and not think about how his opponent will take it?
Against the Edge King, push the Edge Pawn?
Like that will do the trick?
The freedom must be nice, behaving as you like without sensing the other person's mood.
He is so slow it is getting me irritated.
As long as I have got a dragon in this row, I am going to be faster.
It is like I can hear the voices in his head.
I bet he thinks the world revolves around him.
I cannot afford not to take it.
But if I take it, I will be one row off.
He will be able to swing the edge?
Where did I make a mistake?
I did not see that Bishop coming.
Is he going to checkmate me?
Is not there a fast move?
If he will get a bad temper when he loses, he should play more slowly.
You did a lousy job removing that bee's nest!
You made him buzz even louder!
Be more cognizant of the other players around you!
Who suddenly starts poking the hive with a stick?
That was on purpose, was not it?
There are a lot of other ways to deal with it, like wrap it in a bag and fumigate it!
He has been since elementary school!
It is too late to change him now!
So we have all given up!
All you can do is bag him before he starts to buzz!
As you get older, it is harder to focus.
We were playing an important match here!
The next term's seed is on the line!
When you are older, it is tough starting a tournament from square one!
I really want to make it past this round!
Everyone is so noisy buzzing around.
Hachi is too easy to understand, but Kiriyama, you are too hard to understand!
You should live so you are easier to understand.
After all, you are both similar on the inside.
Please do not compare me to him.
You think the world revolves around you, do not you?
This is where Hachi really takes his time.
Let us make it a thorough one!
Despite displaying all of these things, he is surprisingly loved.
Even after that, Hachi hung around Kiriyama
and made him engage in a post-mortem at a family restaurant until the wee hours of the night.
As the world revolved around him,
He yelled that a million times.
We are nothing alike at all!
You are just a second-year high school student.
So please teach me, Mr. Hayashida!
Kiriyama, you are not thinking of going home soon, are you?
